attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 4th June 2007 Lord Coe unveiled the official logo for London 2012 Olympics. I feel that the logo does not reflect the true identity of the games. Its horrible and as a British citizen i feel embarressed that this is representing the image of our games. Please change the logo to something that we will be proud of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
